msbt.message: Ancient ocean creatures left behind so many fossils!It makes sense, I suppose. After all, life originated in the sea, .
Ancient creatures came in so many strange shapes and sizes.I find them both creepyand yet somehow cute, .

So many early life forms have been preserved for us right here.It boggles the mind to think about how they evolved over the eons to become the creatures they are today. My goodness, life is full of mystery and wonder!
Giant fossils are so very impressive! I am awestruck just looking at them.As mature as I am, I feel giddy as a schoolgirl when I walk into this exhibit room, .
To think these enormous creatures once roamed about the world willy-nilly. Looking at these fossils, I can almost feel what it would be like to stand beside one. Very humbling, indeed.
Even though fossils are only skeletons, they still feel soalive!If I stare at them long enough, I can almost imagine them moving. It's a little scary, !
You know, my dear, throughout earth's history, living things have faced extinction time and time again. Looking at these fossils from across the agesit's like reading a story that still has no end, .

What fun it would be to dig for fossils. It must be terribly exciting to unearth clues from our past! Hmm. Perhaps I should have been a paleontologist?Then again, perhaps not. I can't stand getting dirt under my nails, after all.
The ancient world is a never-ending source of mystery and wonder.To think we could still unearth fossils from creatures we didn't even know existed!
Which fossils are you hoping to see? Take your time and look around, .
I do hope you're enjoying our island's museum. I must say, our exhibits are rather excellent.
Looking at fossils from so long ago sometimes it makes me feel rather lonely. I'm glad you came, darling.

This museum is something of a status symbol for the island, don't you think, ? I mean, it's such a civilized and dignified institution to have here on what was once but a deserted isle. I feel more civilized and dignified just being here. And I wouldn't have thought that possible, my dear.

I came to see the fossil exhibit today. These prehistoric finds have ALWAYS fascinated me, .And the way everything is displayed in this roomit's almost as if I've traveledbackin time. What was I saying now? Oh yes! This island's museum is quite splendid.
Now that the museum is open, I'm discovering all kinds of surprising things. Fossils, for example! They're so old and yet they never seem to go out of style, .
